  • Constructor Details

    • LineClient

      public LineClient(String ip, int port)
      Constructor method with ip and port
      Parameters:
      ip - ip address to connect
      port - port number to connect

  • Method Details

    • startClient

      public void startClient()
      Creates a new a connection socket to the server, creates a new BufferedReader and a PrinterWriter and sets them to the ClientOut and ClientInput. Start the game setup

    • clearConsole

      public static void clearConsole()
      Clears the console and prints player and game information

    • stdinScan

      public static void stdinScan()
      Reads incoming messages from the server white the connection isn't closed and executes the specified commands

    • printCommands

      private static void printCommands()
      Prints all available commands on the console

    • initSetup

      public static void initSetup()
      Asks to create a new game or join an existing one

    • newGame

      public static void newGame()
      Asks the number of player of the game and sends a message to server to start a new game. If the input value isn't 2 or 3 the default value 2 is chosen

    • joinGame

      public static void joinGame()
      Send a command to the server to join the selected game

    • login

      public static void login() throws IOException
      Asks the player a username Send a command to the server to log in with the selected username
      Throws:
      IOException

    • chooseDeck

      public static void chooseDeck()
      Asks the player to select an assistant cards deck Send a command to the server to select the chosen deck

    • playCharacterCard

      private static void playCharacterCard()
      Prints the list of available character cards. Asks the player to select one character card to play and asks the optional values necessary to activate some card effects. Sends a command to the server to play the selected card.

    • playAssistantCard

      private static void playAssistantCard()
      Prints the list of available assistant cards. Asks the player to select one assistant card and sends a command to the server to play the selected card.

    • sendSingleIsland

      private static void sendSingleIsland()

    • sendCardsPlayed

      private static void sendCardsPlayed()

    • moveStudentToIsland

      private static void moveStudentToIsland()
      Sends a command to the server to move a student from the hall to an island. Gets a student from the hall, asks the user to input a number the chose the destination island and sends a message to the server wit the command moveStudentToIsland

    • moveStudentToClassroom

      private static void moveStudentToClassroom()
      Asks the user to input a number the chose the destination island and sends a command to the server to move mother nature to the selected island

    • moveMN

      private static void moveMN()
      Gets a student from the hall Sends a command to the server to move a student from the hall to the classroom.

    • chooseCC

      private static void chooseCC()
      Asks the server for the list of cloud cards, asks the user to input a number the chose one cloud card and sends a command to the server to select the cloud card

    • quit

      private static void quit()
      Sends a command to the server to quit the current game and close the connection

    • inputInt

      private static String inputInt()

    • getStudentFromHall

      private static String getStudentFromHall()
      Print the students in the dashboard hall, asks the user to insert the position of the selected student Check if the selected number is acceptable
      Returns:
      number as a string that indicates the position in the hall of the selected student
